General.Name: Integrated Diagnostics Holdings PLC
General.Description: Integrated Diagnostics Holdings plc, a consumer healthcare company, provides various medical diagnostics services to patients. It offers approximately 2,000 diagnostic test services, including immunology, microbiology, hematology, endocrinology, clinical chemistry, molecular biology, cytogenetics, histopathology, and radiology. The company operates in Egypt, Jordan, Sudan, and Nigeria. Integrated Diagnostics Holdings plc was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Saint Helier, Jersey.
General.Address: 12 Castle Street, Saint Helier, Jersey, JE2 3RT
